entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 15 cm over western sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 110 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
